data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My mother is the best mom. She ____ cooks ____ for ____, ____ she ____ me ____ my ____. On ____, ____ takes ____ out ____ lunch ____ the ____. Sometimes we make cookies together at night.
data.partBlankContent: My mother is the best mom. She alw___ cooks din___ for m_, a__ she he___ me wi__ my home____. On week____, s__ takes m_ out t_ lunch a__ the mov___. Sometimes we make cookies together at night.
data.fullContent: My mother is the best mom. She always cooks dinner for me, and she helps me with my homework. On weekends, she takes me out to lunch and the movies. Sometimes we make cookies together at night.
data.answer: 我的妈妈是最好的妈妈。她总是为我做饭，她帮助我做作业。在周末，她带我出去吃午饭和看电影。有时我们晚上一起做饼干。
